name: L-glutamate:FMN aminotransferase (oxidizing, decarboxylating)
definition: L-Glutamate + FMN + Oxygen + H2O + 3 Acceptor <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + 8-Amino-8-demethylriboflavin 5'-phosphate + CO2 + 3 Reduced acceptor
